‚Ü•(Algebra.adjoin ‚Ñ§ {Œº}) ‚âÉ‚Çê[‚Ñ§] ‚Ü•(NumberField.ringOfIntegers (CyclotomicField 3 ‚Ñö))

(here Œº is a primitive cube root of unity in CyclotomicField 3 ‚Ñö). [Aside: this needs Fact (Nat.Prime (3 : ‚Ñï+)) to be available as an instance, which is a minor annoyance.]
So now I'm left with constructing

CyclotomicRing 3 ‚Ñ§ ‚Ñö ‚âÉ‚Çê[‚Ñ§] ‚Ü•(Algebra.adjoin ‚Ñ§ {Œº})

There is docs#CyclotomicRing.eq_adjoin_primitive_root, which says that

CyclotomicRing 3 ‚Ñ§ ‚Ñö = ‚Ü•(Algebra.adjoin ‚Ñ§ {Œº})

so this should be easy, one would think. However:

import Mathlib

instance PNat.three_prime : Fact (Nat.Prime (3 : ‚Ñï+)) := ‚ü®Nat.prime_three‚ü©

variable {Œº : CyclotomicField 3 ‚Ñö} (hŒº : IsPrimitiveRoot Œº (3 : ‚Ñï+))

lemma help : (Algebra.adjoin ‚Ñ§ {b : CyclotomicField 3 ‚Ñö | b ^ 3 = 1}) =
    Algebra.adjoin ‚Ñ§ ({Œº} : Set (CyclotomicField 3 ‚Ñö)) := by
  refine Algebra.adjoin_eq_of_le (Algebra.adjoin ‚Ñ§ {Œº}) (fun x hx ‚Ü¶ ?_) <|
    Algebra.adjoin_mono <| Set.singleton_subset_iff.mpr hŒº.pow_eq_one
  obtain ‚ü®m, _, hm‚ü© := hŒº.eq_pow_of_pow_eq_one hx (by norm_num)
  exact hm ‚ñ∏ Subalgebra.pow_mem _ (Algebra.self_mem_adjoin_singleton ‚Ñ§ Œº) m

noncomputable def Œπ' : CyclotomicRing 3 ‚Ñ§ ‚Ñö ‚âÉ‚Çê[‚Ñ§] ‚Ü•(NumberField.ringOfIntegers (CyclotomicField 3 ‚Ñö)) :=
  (Subalgebra.equivOfEq _ _ <| help hŒº).trans hŒº.adjoinEquivRingOfIntegers'

import Mathlib

namespace AlgEquiv

open Polynomial AdjoinRoot

noncomputable
def adjoinSingletonEquivAdjoinRootMinpoly' {F R : Type*} [CommRing F] [IsDomain F] [IsIntegrallyClosed F]
    [CommRing R] [IsDomain R] [Algebra F R] [NoZeroSMulDivisors F R] {x : R} (hx : IsIntegral F x) :
    Algebra.adjoin F ({x} : Set R) ‚âÉ‚Çê[F] AdjoinRoot (minpoly F x) := by
  refine AlgEquiv.symm <| AlgEquiv.ofBijective (Minpoly.toAdjoin F x) ?_
  refine ‚ü®(injective_iff_map_eq_zero _).2 fun P‚ÇÅ hP‚ÇÅ ‚Ü¶ ?_, Minpoly.toAdjoin.surjective F x‚ü©
  obtain ‚ü®P, rfl‚ü© := mk_surjective P‚ÇÅ
  refine AdjoinRoot.mk_eq_zero.mpr (minpoly.isIntegrallyClosed_dvd hx ?_)
  rwa [Minpoly.toAdjoin_apply', liftHom_mk, ‚Üê Subalgebra.coe_eq_zero, aeval_subalgebra_coe] at hP‚ÇÅ

end AlgEquiv

instance PNat.three_prime : Fact (Nat.Prime (3 : ‚Ñï+)) := ‚ü®Nat.prime_three‚ü©

noncomputable def Œº' : CyclotomicField 3 ‚Ñö := IsCyclotomicExtension.zeta 3 ‚Ñö _

noncomputable abbrev R := Algebra.adjoin ‚Ñ§ {Œº'}

lemma Œº_prim : IsPrimitiveRoot Œº' (3 : ‚Ñï+) := IsCyclotomicExtension.zeta_spec 3 ‚Ñö _

noncomputable def Œº‚ÑÇ' : ‚ÑÇ := IsCyclotomicExtension.zeta 3 ‚ÑÇ _

lemma Œº‚ÑÇ'_prim : IsPrimitiveRoot Œº‚ÑÇ' (3 : ‚Ñï+) := IsCyclotomicExtension.zeta_spec 3 ‚ÑÇ _

lemma minpoly_eq : minpoly ‚Ñ§ Œº' = minpoly ‚Ñ§ Œº‚ÑÇ' := by
  suffices : minpoly ‚Ñö Œº' = minpoly ‚Ñö Œº‚ÑÇ'
  ¬∑ rw [minpoly.isIntegrallyClosed_eq_field_fractions' _ (Œº_prim.isIntegral (by norm_num)),
      minpoly.isIntegrallyClosed_eq_field_fractions' _ (Œº‚ÑÇ'_prim.isIntegral (by norm_num))] at this
    exact (Polynomial.map_injective _ <| RingHom.injective_int (algebraMap ‚Ñ§ ‚Ñö)) this
  have h : Irreducible (Polynomial.cyclotomic ‚Üë3 ‚Ñö) :=
    Polynomial.cyclotomic.irreducible_rat (by norm_num)
  rw [‚Üê IsPrimitiveRoot.minpoly_eq_cyclotomic_of_irreducible Œº_prim h,
    ‚Üê IsPrimitiveRoot.minpoly_eq_cyclotomic_of_irreducible Œº‚ÑÇ'_prim h]

noncomputable abbrev R' := Algebra.adjoin ‚Ñ§ {Œº‚ÑÇ'}

noncomputable def equiv_R1 : R ‚âÉ‚Çê[‚Ñ§] AdjoinRoot (minpoly ‚Ñ§ Œº') :=
  AlgEquiv.adjoinSingletonEquivAdjoinRootMinpoly' (Œº_prim.isIntegral (by norm_num))

noncomputable def equiv_R2 : R' ‚âÉ‚Çê[‚Ñ§] AdjoinRoot (minpoly ‚Ñ§ Œº') :=
  minpoly_eq ‚ñ∏ AlgEquiv.adjoinSingletonEquivAdjoinRootMinpoly' (Œº‚ÑÇ'_prim.isIntegral (by norm_num))

noncomputable def R_equiv_R' := equiv_R1.trans equiv_R2.symm
